summary: This document is an overdraft notice from Fifth Third Bank addressed to Requiro Terra LLC, indicating that the account was overdrawn on October 3, 2016. The notice details the account activity, including the beginning balance, withdrawals, and the overdraft amount, while also providing information on fees and customer service contact details.

persons.name: P. Brian Moore
persons.context: P. Brian Moore is identified as the Senior Vice President of Fifth Third Bank, who signed the overdraft notice.

events.title: Account Overdraft
events.description: The account of Requiro Terra LLC was overdrawn by $550.86.

keyFacts: Requiro Terra LLC's account was overdrawn by $550.86 on October 3, 2016.
Fifth Third Bank waived a $37.00 overdraft fee as a courtesy.
The account had a beginning balance of $10,501.28 on October 3, 2016.
Total withdrawals on that date amounted to $11,052.14.
The notice includes customer service contact information for further assistance.
